["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"由于上游并未提供 rsync，镜像站只同步了 ubuntu/debian 部分。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先启用 32 位架构"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}dpkg --add-architecture i386","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["之后信任来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dl.winehq.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://dl.winehq.org/"}]," 的公钥"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}wget -nc -O /usr/share/keyrings/winehq-archive.key https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/winehq.key","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新增 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/winehq.list"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/winehq.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 13",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"trixie"}],["Debian 12",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"bionic"}]]}],"code":"deb [arch=amd64,i386 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/winehq-archive.key] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{os_name}}/ {{release_name}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"通过以下命令安装 winehq"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt update
{{sudo}}apt install --install-recommends winehq-stable","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Wine builds 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
